ADVANCED_RADAR_MAPPER_DESCRIPTION.message: Long range radar mapper with system wide coverage.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_DESCRIPTION.message: Shields your spaceship from the heat of atmospheric re-entry.

CARGO_LIFE_SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION.message: Leigidh seo leat carago beò a ghiùlan.

CARGO_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Permits scooping cargo pods from space.

DEMP_DESCRIPTION.message: Temporarily overrides the electronics of the attacker..

ECM_ADVANCED_DESCRIPTION.message: An electronic countermeasure missile defence system, capable of destroying more advanced types of homing missiles.

ECM_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: Siostam dìona dealanach an aghaidh astasan a nì milleadh air cuid a dh'astasan le fèin-stiùireadh.

FUEL_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Leigidh seo leat connadh hàidhdreaidean a sgobadh o mhòr-phlanaidean gasa.

HULL_AUTOREPAIR_DESCRIPTION.message: Càraichidh seo an t-slige gu fèin-obrachail nuair a bhios i air dochann.

HYPERCLOUD_ANALYZER_DESCRIPTION.message: Sgrùd neòil os-fhànais gus an ceann-uidhe agus an ùine gus falbh no ruigsinn a shuidheachadh.

LASER_COOLING_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Siostam fuaraidh leasaichte airson nan arm agad.

MININGCANNON_17MW_DESCRIPTION.message: Used to blast-mine mineral rich asteroids.

MULTI_SCOOP.description: A ship equipment: a cargo scoop and fuel scoop combined to one

MULTI_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Ged nach eil e cho èifeachdach 's a tha sgiob connaidh, 's urrainn dhut an dà chuid carago is connadh a sgobadh leis.

PLANETSCANNER.description: Scans the nearest body for resources

PROP_CONVERTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Converter that allows use hydrogen instead of water in propellant engine

RADAR_MAPPER_DESCRIPTION.message: Used to remotely inspect the equipment, cargo and state of other ships.

SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Bheir seo mapa 3D dhut dhe na soithichean am fagas.

SHIELD_ENERGY_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Increases the rate at which shields recharge.

SHIELD_GENERATOR_DESCRIPTION.message: Bheir seo barrachd dìona dhan t-slige leis gach aonad a chuireas tu ris.

TRADE_ANALYZER.description: Ship equipment computing profitable commodities to trade between two systems

TRADE_ANALYZER_DESCRIPTION.message: Shows profitable commodities to trade between selected and current system
